column1: Kata Robata////Kata Robata was by far the best food I had while in Houston. I came here with my coworker with reservations from open table. When the waiter came to the table I asked if they could put together a chef's tasting
column3: the Chef de Cuisine was there to give us a phenomenal 8 course tasting menu. Particular highlights include the seared amberjack with green onion puree
column4: scallops with foie gras and cabernet-blueberry gastrique and the ebi nigiri topped with a whole uni.
